msg.msgText: A call by client {1} to create a consumer for existing subscription {0} failed because the request attempted to modify the settings of a shared subscription, or it attempted to modify a non-shared subscription to a shared subscription.

msgExplanation.p: A consumer can be created for an existing shared subscription only if it does not modify the subscription settings. A consumer cannot be created as a shared subscription consumer on an existing non-shared subscription.

msgUserResponse.p: To modify a shared subscription or to modify a non-shared subscription to be a shared subscription, unsubscribe before making the desired modification.
